Athletics and Sports
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Considered by Kansans to have been one of the state’s greatest athletes, Mr. Schnellbacher became an all-pro defensive back for the N.F.L. Giants and played pro basketball.
snippet: Considered by Kansans to have been one of the state’s greatest athletes, Mr. Schnellbacher became an all-pro defensive back for the N.F.L. Giants and played pro basketball.
